channel.title: Fishing on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Fishing on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: A model was out fishing one day, While the clouds kept the sun at bay. The rod in her hands, She tried to catch lands, And with her luck, …

A gifted pianist, decided to go fishing She’d heard it could be quite relaxing and wishing The sun beat down hot on the lake As she waited …

There was a designer named Pete, Who went fishing for his feat. He’d cast his line, With great design, To catch the biggest catch of the …
A truck driver out on a drive, Loved fishing more than he liked to drive. The lake he did seek, For a bite that week, His tackle was readied …
There once was a tour guide named Jack Whose passion for fishing just wouldn’t slack He’d take tourists a-fishing With stories and wishing …

An architect went out a-fishing In the lake with great ambition He had a wish To catch a fish And get some great recognition
